subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Cardinal’s women’s coach, Tara VanDerveer, has had such success with the triangle offense that the men’s coach, Johnny Dawkins, has also become an enthusiastic practitioner.
snippet: The Cardinal’s women’s coach, Tara VanDerveer, has had such success with the triangle offense that the men’s coach, Johnny Dawkins, has also become an enthusiastic practitioner.
